events.title: Wine Tasting Night
events.description: Join us for an exclusive evening of wine tasting. Sample a curated selection of our finest wines from around the world, paired with artisanal cheeses and charcuterie. Our sommelier will guide you through each tasting.

events.title: Jazz & Dinner
events.description: Enjoy a soulful evening of live jazz music while you dine. We're featuring the 'City Lights Trio' for a night of smooth tunes and delicious food. A perfect night out for music and food lovers.

events.title: Seasonal Cooking Class
events.description: Learn the secrets behind our seasonal dishes with a hands-on cooking class led by Chef Anna. You'll learn to prepare a three-course meal and then enjoy your creations with a glass of wine.
